name: assignment_override_created
definition: The event is emitted anytime an assignment override is created by an end user or API request.
trigger: Triggered when an assignment override is created.

schema.assignment_override_id: The Canvas id of the assignment override.
schema.assignment_id: The Canvas id of the assignment linked to the override.
schema.due_at: The override due_at timestamp, or nil if not overridden.
schema.all_day: The overridden all_day flag, or nil if not overridden.
schema.all_day_date: The overridden all_day_date, or nil if not overridden.
schema.unlock_at: The overridden unlock_at timestamp, or nil if not overridden.
schema.lock_at: The overridden lock_at timestamp, or nil if not overridden.
schema.course_section_id: (if `type='CourseSection'`) Canvas section id that this override applies to.
schema.group_id: (if `type='Group'`) Canvas group id that this override applies to.
schema.workflow_state: Workflow state of the override. (active, deleted)

metadata.user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_14_3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/73.0.3683.103 Safari/537.36
